# Sign in


In this section you logging into __Tercen__.


* Click on the verification email for your Tercen account\
Or
* Go to https://Tercen.com and click on  `Sign in`

\ 
You should now see the sign in menu
<center><img src="images/View_signin_empty.png"></center>
\ 

* Enter your username and password
<center><img src="images/Enter_signin_filled.png"></center>
\ 

* Click on `Sign in` link


You now see your personal page. 
\ 

<img src="images/View_personal_page.png">

You are now signed in to __Tercen__.

In the next section we take a look at your personal page.
